comments.content:
Have you checked the techno fonts at Dafont.com? I think this may have the look of an amateur design, because of inconsistencies of width and style, in my opinion.

- Mike Yanega

Hello Mike! I just check the techno fonts at Dafont.com. But nothing found. Thanks  
Yes I agree with you. This material was created by an agency here in Brazil.  
See the application that site [http://www.conexaomedica.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20091008034556/http:/www.conexaomedica.com.br/ "http://www.conexaomedica.com.br")  
But still need to redesign the typography. :P  
Thank you for trying to help ;)
